ygData.subject: Re: Petition or Melee vs Caster damage
ygData.messageBody:
��<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD W3 HTML//EN"> <HTML> <HEAD> <META
content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type> <META
content='"MSHTML 4.72.3509.100"' name=GENERATOR> </HEAD> <BODY> <DIV><SPAN
class=360261621-10061999><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial size=2>I think the
dsiference between melee comabtants and casters magic should be thus: 
Melee fighters should be able to do just as much damage, if not more,
whereas a caster may strike from a distance, and strike multiple targets
with area effect spells.</FONT></SPAN></DIV> <DIV><SPAN
class=360261621-10061999><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial
size=2></FONT></SPAN> </DIV> <DIV><SPAN class=360261621-10061999><FONT
color=#0000ff face=Arial size=2>I am the president of a national group that
fights with live steel weapons.  I've been fighting with long swords,
2-handed swords, axes and maces for 10 years, and I am very comfortable with
just how devastating these weapons can be.  No matter if you are struck
by lightning or are cut in 2 by a large axe, you are just as
dead!</FONT></SPAN></DIV> <DIV><SPAN class=360261621-10061999><FONT
color=#0000ff face=Arial size=2></FONT></SPAN> </DIV> <DIV><SPAN
class=360261621-10061999><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial size=2>So perhaps
the direction we need to seek, and the diferance between thdse 2 types of
characters. melee and caster, is not how much damage they do, but how. 
A caster should be able to reach far away, and strike multiple targets,
while the great warrior should only be able to strike at one target at a
time, but be able to mow them down like wheat.</FONT></SPAN></DIV>
<DIV><SPAN class=360261621-10061999><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial
size=2></FONT></SPAN> </DIV> <DIV><SPAN class=360261621-10061999><FONT
color=#0000ff face=Arial size=2>Oh, and if anyone is interested in an
organization that allow you to wear armor and swing a real blade ( and trust
me, it will give you a whole new perspective on your RPGing!) check out our
website!</FONT></SPAN></DIV> <DIV><SPAN class=360261621-10061999><FONT
color=#0000ff face=Arial size=2></FONT></SPAN> </DIV> <DIV><SPAN
class=360261621-10061999><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial size=2><A
href="http://www.adrianempire.org\">www.adrianempire.org\</A></FONT></SPAN><
/DIV> <DIV><SPAN class=360261621-10061999><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial
size=2></FONT></SPAN> </DIV> <DIV> </DIV> <BLOCKQUOTE
style="BORDER-LEFT: #0000ff solid 2px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px">
<DIV class=OutlookMessageHeader> </DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></BODY></HTML>
